mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into api_enterprise( Id , SmId , Name , Type , RegCapital , EstablishedTime , Status , Pos , X , Y , RawMaterial , Product , SalesRevenue , TechProcess , Phone , Email , BuzLicense , EIA , EIAcheck , FireControlFile , Certificate , TwoSysBuild , HazardRp , EmergencyPlan , Area , LandCardNo , LandType , LegalPerson , LegalPhone , Principal , SecPrincipal , SecOfficer , GridMember , ProdEquipment , EnvEquipment , SolidWaste , HazardousWaste , WastewaterOut , RaiseDust , ProdDust , ExhaustGasOut , StaffTotal , StaffGraduateAbove , StaffUndergraduate , StaffJuniorCollege , StaffOther , HasPartyOrg , PartyMemberTotal , VillageCode , Town , VillageName , IndustryType , IndustryCode , CurrentStatus , JiGaiShiJianNeiRong , LiXiangNeiRongWenHaoShiJian , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, #{SmId}, #{Name}, #{Type}, #{RegCapital}, #{EstablishedTime}, #{Status}, #{Pos}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{RawMaterial}, #{Product}, #{SalesRevenue}, #{TechProcess}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e')), #{Email}, #{BuzLicense}, #{EIA}, #{EIAcheck}, #{FireControlFile}, #{Certificate}, #{TwoSysBuild}, #{HazardRp}, #{EmergencyPlan}, #{Area}, #{LandCardNo}, #{LandType}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{LegalPerson},'e')), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{LegalPhone},'e')), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Principal},'e')), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{SecPrincipal},'e')), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{SecOfficer},'e')), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{GridMember},'e')), #{ProdEquipment}, #{EnvEquipment}, #{SolidWaste}, #{HazardousWaste}, #{WastewaterOut}, #{RaiseDust}, #{ProdDust}, #{ExhaustGasOut}, #{StaffTotal}, #{StaffGraduateAbove}, #{StaffUndergraduate}, #{StaffJuniorCollege}, #{StaffOther}, #{HasPartyOrg}, #{PartyMemberTotal}, #{VillageCode}, #{Town}, #{VillageName}, #{IndustryType}, #{IndustryCode}, #{CurrentStatus}, #{JiGaiShiJianNeiRong}, #{LiXiangNeiRongWenHaoShiJian}, #{EtlTime} )
